org.projekt.rssreader.gui

Class ChannelContentViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.projekt.rssreader.gui.ChannelContentViewer

  • public class ChannelContentViewer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for creation of the object representing the browser of the main window

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChannelContentViewer

        public ChannelContentViewer(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shl,
                    org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Tree tree,
                    org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite tableComposite,
                    org.eclipse.swt.layout.FormData fdTree,
                    org.eclipse.swt.layout.FormData fdTable)
        The constructor of the browser. Takes the shell, table composite, tree and table form data as parameters. Creates a basic browser area with basic configuration
        Parameters:
        shl - the reference to the shell object
        tree - the reference to the tree object
        tableComposite - the reference to the tables composite object
        fdTree - the reference to the tree's form data object
        fdTable - the reference to the table's form data object
        See Also:
        Tree , Compsite , FormData , Browser
